positions.title: Senior 3D Animator
positions.overview: We are seeking a highly skilled Senior 3D Animator to bring our characters and worlds to life with fluid, believable, and emotionally compelling animations. You will be a key player in a team dedicated to creating a visually stunning cinematic universe rooted in epic mythology.
responsibilities: Create high-quality character, creature, and environmental animations for cinematic sequences.
Collaborate closely with the art, story, and VFX teams to ensure a cohesive and powerful visual narrative.
Mentor junior animators, providing feedback and guidance to uphold the studio's quality standards.
Contribute to the development of animation pipelines and workflows to improve efficiency and creative output.
qualifications: 5+ years of professional experience in character animation for feature film, television, or high-end game cinematics.
Expert proficiency in Maya, Blender, or a similar 3D animation software.
A strong portfolio demonstrating exceptional skill in keyframe animation, timing, and weight.
Deep understanding of anatomy, kinematics, and character performance.
positions.compensation: Competitive salary plus performance bonuses. Comprehensive benefits package including health, dental, and vision.

positions.title: VFX Compositor
positions.overview: We are looking for a talented VFX Compositor to join our post-production team. You will be responsible for integrating various visual elements, including live-action footage, CGI, and matte paintings, to create seamless and breathtaking final shots for our epic films.
responsibilities: Integrate 2D and 3D elements into live-action plates.
Perform tasks such as tracking, rotoscoping, color correction, and keying.
Collaborate with lighters and other artists to ensure shots meet the creative direction.
Troubleshoot and solve technical issues in the compositing pipeline.
qualifications: 3+ years of experience as a compositor in the film or high-end television industry.
Expert knowledge of Nuke or a similar node-based compositing software.
A strong eye for detail, color, composition, and lighting.
Solid understanding of the entire visual effects pipeline.
Ability to work efficiently under tight deadlines.
positions.compensation: Competitive salary and a comprehensive benefits package.
